main event: A bright white light with erratic motion was observed in North Branford, Connecticut, on June 23, 1963.
interesting points: The object changed brightness and direction, including reversing its motion., Witness estimated the object's speed to be around 5,000 mph., The object had no visible trail and disappeared behind clouds., A witness described the object as a light round or oyster-shaped object about 12-15 feet in diameter., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes.
